summary: The video features a man in a suit delivering a speech in French. He mentions 'Le Rassemblement National' achieving its most significant breakthrough in history. The speaker criticizes an alliance referred to as 'l'alliance du déshonneur,' involving Emmanuel Macron and Gabriel Attal, which he claims has led to dangerous electoral arrangements with far-left formations. This, according to the speaker, prevents the French from having a policy of recovery that they had widely supported, placing 'Le Rassemblement National' at the top in European elections and securing nearly 34% of votes in the first round. The speaker expresses concern that these electoral agreements will lead France into the hands of the far-left, represented by Jean-Luc Mélenchon. The speaker concludes with a commitment to being there for the audience until victory, stating that a new era has begun and nothing can stop a people who have regained hope. The speech ends with patriotic sentiments, wishing long life to France and the Republic.
keywords: Le Rassemblement National, Emmanuel Macron, Gabriel Attal, extrême-gauche, Jean-Luc Mélenchon, politique de redressement, victoire, France, République
